plot: Davy Crockett and his sidekick Georgie compete against boastful Mike Fink (&"King of the River&") in a boat race to New Orleans. Later, Davy and Georgie, allied with Fink, battle a group of river pirates trying to pass themselves off as Native Americans.   Written by  Ken Miller
title: Los piratas del Mississippi
plot_es: Davy Crockett and his sidekick Georgie compete against boastful Mike Fink (&"King of the River&") in a boat race to New Orleans. Later, Davy and Georgie, allied with Fink, battle a group of river pirates trying to pass themselves off as Native Americans.   Written by  Ken Miller
original_name: Davy Crockett and the River Pirates
plot_en: Davy Crockett and his sidekick Georgie compete against boastful Mike Fink (&"King of the River&") in a boat race to New Orleans. Later, Davy and Georgie, allied with Fink, battle a group of river pirates trying to pass themselves off as Native Americans.   Written by  Ken Miller
